page.title: 18GENERAL LIFE
page.content: There are small{hamlets}whose residents cover a wide range of ages _ Junior school to retirement.Few men are actually employed on the farms and none of the children are likely to work in the{country.}For economic reasons most wives work. Few tradesmen call at the{cottages}so people depend on what they grow in the garden and on shopping trips to nearby towns. About a quarter of the people go to {church}regularly and the children belong to the{Scouting}and{Guiding movement. In spite of varied backgrounds and types of education there is still a friendly atmosphere and chats at the garden gate.
